title: Nexo Capital Announces U.S. Market Re-entry at Conference with Donald Trump Jr.
summary: Nexo Capital announced its return to the U.S. market during a conference in Bulgaria, featuring Donald Trump Jr. as a keynote speaker. The company, which previously paid a $45 million regulatory settlement, cited 'productive' discussions with regulators and optimism about the current cryptocurrency regulatory environment.
description: Cryptocurrency firm Nexo Capital announced its plans to re-enter the American market after 'productive' talks with regulators at a conference in Bulgaria featuring Donald Trump Jr. as keynote speaker.

sources.title: At event with Donald Trump Jr., Bulgaria crypto firm Nexo announces US return
At event with Donald Trump Jr in Bulgaria, crypto firm Nexo announces US return
Digital Asset Platform Nexo to Return to U.S., Cites Crypto Optimism Under Donald Trump

notes: Nexo's return follows previous $45 million regulatory settlement, signaling renewed U.S. market optimism
